tool_description: Analyzes historical shipping and delivery data to provide insights on carrier performance, delivery times, and service quality metrics.
error_messages: Invalid date range: end_date must be after start_date.
Date range too large: Analysis period cannot exceed 1 year.
No data available: No shipping data found for the specified period and carriers.
Invalid metric: Supported metrics are [delivery_time, on_time_rate, exception_rate, cost_efficiency, customer_satisfaction].
usage: Specify start_date and end_date for analysis. Optionally filter by carriers and specify which metrics to calculate.

performance_metrics.description: Detailed performance metrics for each carrier
